The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 October is 526,086 (934.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 October, there were 84,352 new confirmed cases (149.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 October, there were 56,656 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 49% ( 27,696 extra cases).
